content: shrimp happens was designed for my shrimp loving husband cole he is and always will be the true champion of the endless shrimp promotion may red lobster rest in peace this pattern is for an adult sized beanie one size fits most finished measurements are 20 in diameter and 7 tall the brim is folded and joined by picking up the provisional cast on stitches on a second circular needle then joining the brim in the k1p1 pattern there are many fantastic videos on youtube if you are unfamiliar with this method yarn malabrigo yarn rios reflecting pool 60g/126yds malabrigo yarn rios peachy 13g/28yds malabrigo yarn rios glazed carrot 5g/11yds supplies 3 5mm 16 circulars or 0 5mm smaller than needles used to obtain gauge 4 0mm 16 circulars or needles needed to obtain gauge 4 0mm dpns or longer cable if using magic loop method yarn needle 4 0mm crochet hook waste yarn
